contest-event.event-date:
April 30, 1983 D Grand Shield British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) 10 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival grand-shield Winners back to 1952 are as engraved on the current Grand Shield trophy. Except for 1981 to 1984 where the bands on the trophy appear to have come second, not first! Was a different trophy given to the winners? If you know the answer please let us know.

There are also results on the trophy from 1902 to 1938, but they are for the Crystal Palace Contest (see link at top of page). Symphony of Marches Champness Hall, Rochdale, Greater Manchester, England, UK May 1, 2010, 4:41 p.m. Dec. 12, 2014, 11:06 a.m. 1 Hyundai Heart of England Stephen Roberts 2 Point of Ayr Colliery Band Denzil Stephens 3 Unite the Union (City of Sheffield) David Hirst 4 Yarwell & Nassington John Berryman 5 Rockingham Band Graham O'Connor 6 Dobcross Silver Band Les Beevers Unknown Result Blidworth Welfare Band Alan Tyler Unknown Result Stacksteads Brass Band Edward Tarling Unknown Result City of Chester Band John Golland Unknown Result Lancashire Constabulary Band Ray Farr Unknown Result Pemberton Old Wigan DW Band Stephen Brodie Unknown Result Lockwood Band (Huddersfield) Peter Kitson Unknown Result Newham Band Melvin White Unknown Result British Aerospace (Chadderton) Peter Lockett Unknown Result NASUWT Riverside Chris Lawn Unknown Result Greenalls Band John Hudson Unknown Result Bedford Town Band Terry Hext Unknown Result Barrow Shipyard Band William Maginn Unknown Result Warburtons Bakery Band John Golland Unknown Result Cinderford Band Cecil Chappell Unknown Result Stalybridge Old Band Ernest Woodhouse Withdrawn BMP (Europe) Goodshaw Band David Lever
